moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Eyes on the Prize!
moves.effect: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by up to three based on how low their HP is. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by up to three stat ranks based on how low their HP is.

passives.name: High Five 1
passives.description: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed after a sync move.

passives.name: Head Start 1
passives.description: Reduces the sync move countdown by 1 when the Pokémon enters a battle for the first time.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 6
passives.description: Once per battle, charges the user’s move gauge by six when the user is in a pinch.

grid.bonus: X Sp. Atk:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
X Sp. Atk:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Dragon Breath:Hostile Environment 1- Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
Dragon Breath:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Breath:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Breath:Furious Brawn- The more the user’s Attack has been raised, the more it powers up moves.
Clanging Scales:Unhindered- When the Pokémon attacks, ignores damage-reducing effects on the opponent’s field of play.
Clanging Scales:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Clanging Scales:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Eyes on the Prize!:MP Refresh 4- Has a good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Snow Shelter- Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.
Sand Shelter- Protects the Pokémon from damage from a sandstorm.
On the Ropes 5- Reduces damage when the Pokémon is in a pinch and is hit by a physical attack move.
Paralysis Synergy 2- Powers up moves when the target is paralyzed.
Adrenaline 1- Reduces the sync move countdown by one when a sync move is used for the first time.
Last Dash 4- Once per battle, substantially raises the user’s Speed when in a pinch.
Static Shock 5- Powers up sync moves when the target is paralyzed.
High Five 1- Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed after a sync move.
